ingredients.ingredient: 1 eggplant, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 (28 ounce) can plum tomatoes with juice, chopped

cookingTips: Salt eggplant cubes and let sit 15 minutes to remove excess moisture before cooking
Cook pasta al dente and reserve 1 cup pasta water to adjust sauce consistency
Simmer sauce for 15-20 minutes to allow flavors to meld
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How comfortable are you with timing pasta to finish cooking when the sauce is ready?
